name: Unuglify Facebook Messages
description: Removes the ugly gradients on the facebook message bubbles and allows you to set your own colours.
additional_info: Instructions There's not much to tell you about using it: just install it and the looks are applied! The default colours are what I deemed looked the best with the color scheme... Changes Last Updated: Fri May 16 2014 23:31:02 GMT+0300 (FLE Daylight Time) 1.2 : Facebook changed backend, new classnames, changed back to how it used to be. 1.1 : Changed to accommodate .bubbles -> .conversation 1.0 : Uploaded to userstyles.org, added variable colours License It's totally public domain.
